name: Rento - Online monopoly game
description:
RENTO is free business game. It is similar to the original monopoly game, but it has a slightly different rules and many additional features and extras.

Trade lands, build houses, win auctions and most importantly - have fun. If you like Ludo, Monopoly or family dice games - you will like Rento too :)

The game is live MULTIPLAYER so you can play with your friends and family remotely and also you can play versus players on our BoardGamesOnline.Net website.

You can play the game in 3 modes:

  • ONLINE (vs real people live)
  • SOLO (versus AI robots)
  • Pass 'N Play (Pass the same device to others)

Enjoy the first and only true online multiplayer business game in the market.
